alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, southern Prowers, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas and southern Bent Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of developing thunderstorms spanning from northeast Las Animas County to eastern Prowers County. Storms are nearly stationary, and will be capable of producing locally heavy rainfall, gusty winds, and landspout tornadoes. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Two Buttes Reservoir. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
